Name Rascal/Libraries/Graph/predecessors

Function set[&T] predecessors(Graph[&T] G, &T From)
Description Returns the direct predecessors of node From in Graph G.
Examples 
rascal>import Graph;
ok
rascal>predecessors({<1,2>, <1,3>, <2,4>, <3,4>}, 4);
set[int]: {3,2}
